sourcesContent:
<template>
  <transition name="fab-transition" mode="out-in" appear>
    <Layout></Layout>
  </transition>
</template>

<script>

import { useRouter } from './utils'
import Layout from "./layout/vertical/LayoutContentVerticalNav.vue";
// import UpgradeToPro from './components/comm/UpgradeToPro.vue';

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: { Layout },

  computed:{
    resolveLayoutVariant (){
      const { route } = useRouter(); 
     
      if (route.value.meta.layout === 'blank') return 'layout-blank'
      if (route.value.meta.layout === 'content') return `layout-content-Vertical-nav`
      return null

    } 
  },
  created() {

    console.log(this.resolveLayoutVariant)
    // window.onbeforeunload = function () {
    // 	navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ video: true }).then(md => {
    // 		console.log(md);
    // 		md.getTracks().forEach(t => {
    // 			console.log(t);
    // 			t.stop();
    // 		});
    // 	});
    // 	return 'aaaaaa';
    // };
  },
};
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}

@media all and (display-mode: standalone) {
  .pwa {
    display: block;
  }
  .browser {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media all and (display-mode: browser) {
  .pwa {
    display: none;
  }
  .browser {
    display: block;
  }
}
</style>
